features.title: Why Choose Us?
features.subtitle: Experience hassle-free car rental with our premium services.
features.wide_selection_desc: Explore a diverse range of vehicles, from compact cars to spacious SUVs.
features.easy_booking_desc: Our intuitive platform makes renting a car quick and hassle-free.
features.affordable_prices_desc: Get the best value for your money with our competitive rates.
features.24_7_support_desc: Our dedicated support team is always available to assist you.
features.multiple_locations_desc: Pick up or drop off your car at convenient locations across the city.
features.flexible_options_desc: Choose from various rental durations and customizable options.

how.title: How It Works
how.subtitle: Renting a car with us is easy. Just follow these simple steps.
how.step1_desc: Browse our extensive fleet and select the perfect car for your needs.
how.step2_desc: Securely book your chosen vehicle online in just a few clicks.
how.step3_desc: Collect your car from the designated location and start your journey.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from our satisfied clients about their rental experiences.
testimonials.text1: Renting was so smooth! The car was clean and the process was quick.
testimonials.text2: Great service and friendly staff. I highly recommend them!
testimonials.text3: Affordable prices and a wide selection of cars. Will rent again!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our car rental service.
faq.q1: What is the minimum age to rent a car?
faq.a1: The minimum age is typically 21, but may vary depending on the vehicle type and location.
faq.a2: You will generally need a valid driver's license, a major credit card, and depending on location, potentially an international driving permit or passport.
faq.q3: Can I add an additional driver?
faq.a3: Yes, additional drivers can usually be added to the rental agreement for an extra fee. They must meet the same rental requirements as the primary driver.

cta.title: Ready to Hit the Road?
cta.subtitle: Find the perfect car for your next adventure or trip and book today!
